nodes.text: A mission took place during the Clone Wars in which Jedi Master Plo Koon and Padawan Ahsoka Tano traveled to Florrum to apprehend Boba Fett and his mentor, Aurra Sing. Sing and the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk were assisting the young Fett gain revenge against Mace Windu who had killed Boba's father, Jango, during the First Battle of Geonosis. The mission ended with Boba Fett and Bossk captured by the Jedi, and Sing presumed dead after crashing Slave I into the surface of Florrum.
